overview: The Clamclit sisters are "movin' on up" and swapping their beloved hillbilly farm for a lil' ol' mansion in Beverly Hills, that is, if Mr. Dripsdale doesn't screw up the deal! There's a shitload of good, old-fashioned country fun in this down right nasty tale. Blonde honey, Tiffany, gets so hot she bends over and does her very first backdoor! As if that's not enough to get y'alls attention, she squeezes so hard on her tits, they gush with warm, frothy milk! Yeee-haw!Scene 1. Tiffany Million, Jon Dough, Mike Horner Scene 2. Beverly Glen, Mandy Foxx Scene 3. Sahara Sands, Richie Razor Scene 4. Mandy Foxx, Jonathan Morgan, Steven St. Croix Scene 5. Sahara Sands, Sydney St. James, Valeria Scene 6. Tiffany Million, Richie RazorLanguage
title: The Beaverly Hillbillies
